action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Josephine,

Thanks for your patience in getting back to you.

We have made the below updates:

a) In the view product page, for ex.: https://veneyes.com.au/product/felicia-pt/
When clicking Add to cart, there is a message called: Please select some product options before adding this product to your cart.
Can it be changed to Please select colour options before adding this product to your cart.
***Done***

b) Is it possible to move the colour options in the Desktop version up, after the Description of the product.
***We have gotten this as close as possible within the constraints of the way the website was built***

c) & in the Mobile version move just before the name of the product. Please see attached imgs.
***We have gotten this as close as possible within the constraints of the way the website was built***

d) Can we add the colour options (to be changed when rollover) in the main page as attached img & delete the line under the price.
***Done***

Regarding the image resolutions, are there any in particular you are referring to? The ones on the home page slider are grainy, but that is because they are a small size image loading in a large space. They are being stretched out, which is causing the grainy look.

Let me know your thoughts.

+1 hours from the previous ticket. 

@rica (TIme: 60mins)

Hi Heath,

Following our call, could you please take a look at the product image resolution?
They are not displaying in high resolution as originally intended. What can be done to optimise the resolution?

Thanks,

Kind regards,
Josephine



Josephine Roufaiel
Managing Director

venEyes 3D Printed Customised Eyewear
Ph: 02 7228 9228 | M: +61 422 066 357

Please consider our environment before printing this e-mail. This e-mail is confidential and should be read only by the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify us immediately by telephone or email and destroy and delete this message from your computer.

Good morning Heath,

Just small tips that might work better.

Can you please add the lock icon and wording Secure Checkout in the Add to cart page & Checkout page as attached imgs.
It might be reassuring to some customers.

I have noticed that some people stop at the "View Products" page, so I am testing what might be preventing them from proceeding.

a) In the view product page, for ex.: https://veneyes.com.au/product/felicia-pt/
When clicking Add to cart, there is a message called: Please select some product options before adding this product to your cart.
Can it be changed to Please select colour options before adding this product to your cart.

b) Is it possible to move the colour options in the Desktop version up, after the Description of the product.
c) & in the Mobile version move just before the name of the product. Please see attached imgs.

d) Can we add the colour options (to be changed when rollover) in the main page as attached img & delete the line under the price.

Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you.

Kind regards,
Josephine

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Sorry for confusion.

I only don't want the message and red line to appear. but the 2 buttons of "Pay with PayPal" and "Pay with Credit Card" were so good.

Is it possible to put back the two button options, "Pay with PayPal" and "Pay with Credit Card," as they were before?
People can buy through credit card straight away.

Kind regards,
Josephine
